text: Gersthofen (Swabian: Geäschdhoofe) is a town in the district of Augsburg, in Bavaria, Germany. It is on the west bank of the river Lech, about north of Augsburg. Gersthofen is split into five districts (German: Stadtteile): Batzenhofen, Edenbergen (with Gailenbach and Gailenbacher Mühle), Gersthofen, Hirblingen, and Rettenbergen (with Peterhof). ==References== Category:Augsburg (district)
title: Gersthofen
